author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Kari Byron mentioned a drama-stirring producer on her @MythfitsPod podcast. What's the most memorable thing a producer asked Adam Savage to do? Any more builds planned for the pantograph mill? Does Adam have any advice on how to grind a fuller in an aluminium blade using regular shop tools? In this live excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members Crispy Chrissy, Patrick Hennessy and Nerding for Fun Props, whom we thank for their support! 

Kari and Tory's MythFits Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/@UCjp5QN8e3nk2f4u9JdcpAgQ 
Pantograph Mill: The Coolest Machine Adam Savage Owns! https://youtu.be/pku2VRADLGk
Jeffrey Pringle: https://www.instagram.com/jeffreypringle
00:00 MythBusters producer
02:43 Pantograph mill
06:05 Miniature vault
06:55 Aluminum sword
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:

title: The Thing Adam Refused to Do When Asked by a MythBusters Producer
